teacheasy.xml

Class XMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.xml.XMLWriter

  • public class XMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles XML writing, based on data stored in Lesson objects.
    Version:
    1.0 05 Feb 2015
    Author:
    Alistair Jewers

    • Method Detail

      • writeXML

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> writeXML(Lesson lesson,
                                             java.lang.String filename)
        Writes an XML file with the data stored in a lesson data structure.
        Parameters:
        lesson - The lesson to convert to XML.
        filename - The file name and path.
        Returns:
        A list of the errors and warnings that occured during writing.
